name: Hivemind (Spotted_Leaf)
description:
In Hivemind, you collect bugs to defeat insect predators in the jungle. Build a deck of cool bugs that can synergize to create powerful armies!  Here are some tips:

- Use bumblebees to forage for new cards

- Right click on cards, bugs or predators to find out what they do

- Watch out for the bald eagle, he will eat your bugs if you spend too much time on a single enemy

- Keep an eye on your energy level in the bottom left, you use it to play cards

If you like the game, let me know in the comments!
